NG0221:2: many+dzu shri kro d+ha tsit+ta shang+ku gu h+ya tan+t+ra /
NG0221:4: 'jam dpal khro bo snying gzer gsang ba'i rgyud /
NG0221:5: bcom ldan 'das ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po gdug pa gsum 'dul ba de la phyag 'tshal lo //
NG0221:6: de nas rdo rje snying po yis //
NG0221:7: rdo rje khro bo 'jigs pa'i tshogs //
NG0221:8: kun nas gus pas thal sbyar te //
NG0221:9: bde chen yab la 'di skad gsol //
NG0221:10: e ma ho sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin //
NG0221:11: rdo rje 'chang gi ngo bo nyid //
NG0221:12: snyigs ma lnga yi dus nyid du //
NG0221:13: mtshams med las ngan kun spyod pas //
NG0221:14: nad dang gdon du rnam smin pa'i //
NG0221:15: sa yams drag po dz+wa la'i nad //
NG0221:16: 'gro ba yongs la khyab pa la //
NG0221:17: srung ba'i rim pa bshad du gsol //
NG0221:18: de nas phyag rgya chen po yis //
NG0221:19: rdo rje snying po'i khro tshogs la //
NG0221:20: gsang tshig drag po'i dmod pa yis //
NG0221:21: bcud lnga'i snying po gso ba'i mchog / 'khor la nges par bka' stsal to //
NG0221:22: snyigs ma lnga yi dus nyid du //
NG0221:23: mtshams med las ngan kun spyod pas //
NG0221:24: mdze yams drag po nyam nga dar //
NG0221:25: nad ni rnam pa gsum yin te //
NG0221:26: spyi dang khyad par la sogs pa //
NG0221:27: sdom par gyur pa kun nyams dang *//
NG0221:28: mtshams med nye ba'i rnam smin pas //
NG0221:29: gnas ngan ltung ba'i rigs dag la //
NG0221:30: las kyi rnam smin nad 'byung ba'o //
NG0221:31: rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa yis //
NG0221:34: rigs dang rang gi glang thabs las //
NG0221:35: rtsol ba byad kyi gtad khram dang *//
NG0221:36: rang gi gnas su ma phyin log / de lnga'i rkyen las byung ba'i nad //
NG0221:37: rkyen gyis bslang ba'i nad 'byung ba'o //
NG0221:38: de yi nad rigs bstan bya ba //
NG0221:39: sngags dang sman gyi sbyor ba bsdebs //
NG0221:40: sngags la phan gnod ma tshor bar //
NG0221:41: sman gyi phan gnod che ba na //
NG0221:42: 'du ba rnam bzhi'i nad dar bas //
NG0221:43: 'tsho byed sman gyis bcos par bya //
NG0221:44: sngags rnams bzlas kyang phan gnod med //
NG0221:45: zas la yang na phan gnod med //
NG0221:46: de ni rnam smin las yin pas //
NG0221:47: 'dus byas dge rtsa ci nus bya //
NG0221:48: sngags la phan gnod cher 'byung zhing *//
NG0221:49: zas la phan gnod ma thon na //
NG0221:50: rkyen zlog sngags kyi sbyor ba bya //
NG0221:51: nad pa glu la dga' ba dang *//
NG0221:52: nub mo na nas snying mi dga' //
NG0221:53: lus la tsha ba'i khrag skyes pa //
NG0221:54: klu ya nad kyis zin pa'o //
NG0221:55: de la gdug pa'i nad dang dug / rigs bzhi gdol pa kha 'khor gyi //
NG0221:56: 'jug pa nges pa'i tshad mas brtag / rgyal rigs mgo nas 'jug par byed //
NG0221:57: rje rigs lag pa g.yas la 'jug / bram ze
NG0221:58: lag pa g.yon la 'jug / dmangs rigs rkang pa
NG0221:59: g.yas la 'jug / gdol pa rkang pa g.yon la
NG0221:60: 'jug / kha 'khor lus la khyab pa ste //
NG0221:61: drag sngags 'khor los dug rlangs gdon //
NG0221:62: lci 'thibs rgyal rigs sa yi dug / grang ba
NG0221:63: bram ze chu yi dug / tsha ba rje rigs
NG0221:64: me yi dug / yang g.yo dmangs rigs rlung gi
NG0221:67: snying gzer 'khor lo gnyan por gdon //
NG0221:68: rtags med klu yi gdon gnod na //
NG0221:69: phyag rgya bsam gtan cho ga bya //
NG0221:70: kun nas zhugs par gyur pa la //
NG0221:71: yang gsang thugs kyi 'khor lo bskor //
NG0221:72: rang bzhin drag po btsan thabs kyi //
NG0221:73: dug gsum nad dang zhen chags dbral //
NG0221:74: bsam gtan khrus kyi cho ga dang *//
NG0221:75: phyag rgya chen po'i sbyin sreg bya //
NG0221:76: 'jam dpal khro bo snying gzer gsang ba'i rgyud las /
NG0221:77: sa yams kyi nad brtags pa'i le'u ste skabs dang
NG0221:78: po'o // // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
NG0221:79: sa yams drag po'i nad de dag gi gnyen po
NG0221:80: / drag sngags 'khor lo 'di dag gsungs so //
NG0221:81: rtsa ba lus kyi snying po ni //
NG0221:82: shis la tshan che rno la myur //
NG0221:83: klad du che la rgyal po 'dra //
NG0221:84: spu gri du ma skabs kyis te //
NG0221:85: rgyal rigs rje rigs bram ze dang *//
NG0221:86: dmangs dang gdol par gyur pa dang *//
NG0221:87: ba su ta dang 'phye bo dang *//
NG0221:88: rkang gcig gel pa mgo mang dang *//
NG0221:89: gdug pa che dang sa yams dang *//
NG0221:91: sa bdag sa srin gnyan gyi rigs //
NG0221:92: klu bdud klu srin la sogs pa //
NG0221:93: ma mo rgyal po btsan mdze 'dre //
NG0221:94: las dang sbyor ba stobs kyis gcad //
NG0221:95: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdug pa gsum 'dul gyi gsang sngags 'di gsungs so //
NG0221:96: e myags ya rngubs mug shag ka dun //
NG0221:97: e ka he dun ya ma snying khrag ra ma tsa ya /
NG0221:98: sa na ga tsit+ta ri myags rbad /
NG0221:99: khrag la myags ti yam shag rbad /
NG0221:100: dug phyung khrag shig tsit+ta rbad /
NG0221:101: kham shag thum ril hril myags rbad /
NG0221:102: tsa tri ma ma dbugs la thang gzer rbad /
NG0221:103: sa na ga rtsa la hur thum rbad /
NG0221:105: sa na ga ma trag snying gzer rbad /
NG0221:106: sa na ga tsa tri snying gzer rbad /
NG0221:107: sa na ga du me snying gzer rbad /
NG0221:108: sa na ga k+she tri snying gzer rbad /
NG0221:109: sa na ga dug phyung snying gzer rbad /
NG0221:110: sa na ga kham shag snying gzer rbad /
NG0221:111: sa na ga srog snying gzer rbad /
NG0221:112: sa na ga thum snying gzer rbad /
NG0221:113: sa na ga snying gzer sbur nan rbad /
NG0221:114: sa na ga snying gzer dza /
NG0221:115: sa na ga snying gzer dug phyung nan rbad /
NG0221:116: sa na ga snying gzer tsit+ta khas nan rbad /
NG0221:117: sa na ga snying gzer thun nan rbad /
NG0221:118: sa na ga snying gzer du ram nan rbad /
NG0221:119: sa na ga snying gzer yam bzlog nan rbad /
NG0221:120: sa na ga snying gzer srog la nan /
NG0221:121: sa na ga snying gzer tsit+ta myogs nan rbad /
NG0221:122: sa na ga snying gzer thum ril nan rbad /
NG0221:123: sa na ga snying gzer tsa la nan rbad /
NG0221:124: sa na ga snying gzer ya nan 'drid nan rbad /
NG0221:125: sa na ga snying gzer breng shag nan rbad /
NG0221:126: sa na ga snying gzer tsit+ta khas nan rbad /
NG0221:127: sa na ga snying gzer khrag thibs nan rbad //
NG0221:128: sa na ga snying gzer sbur nan rbad /
NG0221:129: sa na ga snying gzer ti nan rbad /
NG0221:130: sa na ga snying gzer u nan tan rbad /
NG0221:131: sa na ga snying gzer e nan rbad /
NG0221:132: sa na ga snying gzer srog la dun dun nan rbad /
NG0221:133: sa na ga snying gzer tsit+ta thums nan @#//
NG0221:135: sa na ga snying gzer du yam bzlog nan rbad /
NG0221:136: sa na ga snying gzer sbur nan rbad /
NG0221:137: sa na ga snying gzer 'drid phyung nan rbad /
NG0221:138: sa na ga snying gzer srog la myogs nan rbad /
NG0221:139: sa na ga snying gzer du ram nan rbad /
NG0221:140: sa na ga snying gzer yam bzlog nan rbad /
NG0221:141: sa na ga snying gzer tsi la nan rbad /
NG0221:142: sa na ga snying gzer u nan rbad /
NG0221:143: sarba du ram a nan 'drid phyung snying gzer thum ril shag rbad /
NG0221:144: he sa ma ya thi pa ra ya sa na ga snying gzer sbur nan /
NG0221:145: sa na ga srog la dun dun shag / sa
NG0221:146: na ga tsit+ta thum ril shag / sa na ga
NG0221:147: rtsa la rbad thum ril shag / sa na ga
NG0221:148: du ma ling shag / sa na ga srog la
NG0221:149: hur thum ril shag / sa na ga snying gzer
NG0221:150: sbur nan thum ril shag / sa na ga du
NG0221:151: me ma ma srog gzir rbad thum ril shag /
NG0221:152: sa na ga tsa tri shu la gzir nan thum
NG0221:153: ril shag / sa na ga nr-i tri yam shig
NG0221:154: nan gzir thum ril shag / sa na ga srog
NG0221:155: la breng shag thum ril dun dun dza /
NG0221:156: sa na ga snying gzer sarba u nan gzer phyung rbad /
NG0221:157: sa na ga du ram i dan 'drid phyung tsit+ta snying gzer thum ril shag rbad /
NG0221:158: sa na ga dug phyung snying gzer rbad /
NG0221:159: sa na ga dum ling thum ril shag / sa na ga dum ling thum ril shag rbad /
NG0221:160: sarba tsit+ta ro myags kha tham srog gzir sbur nan 'drid phyung hri shag rbad /
NG0221:161: sa na ga tsit+ta ro myags rbad /
NG0221:165: sa na ga dug phyung snying gzer rbad /
NG0221:166: sa na ga ma trag snying gzer rbad /
NG0221:167: sa na ga tsa tri snying gzer tsit+ta rbad /
NG0221:168: sa na ga snying gzer sbur nan rbad /
NG0221:169: sa na ga snying gzer sbur 'drid phyung rbad /
NG0221:170: sa na ga kham shag thum ril hril myags rbad /
NG0221:171: tsa tri ma ma dbugs la thang gzer rbad /
NG0221:174: sa na ga khram la myogs ti rbad /
NG0221:175: kham shag thum ril hril myogs rbad /
NG0221:176: sa na ga dum ling thum ril shag / sa
NG0221:177: na ga rtsal rbad thum ril shag / sa na
NG0221:178: ga tsit+ta ro myag kha tham srog gzir sbur nan
NG0221:180: sa na ga snying gzer sbur nan rbad /
NG0221:181: sa na ga ma trag snying gzer rbad /
NG0221:182: sa na ga tsit+ta ro myags rbad /
NG0221:183: du me mam srog gzir thum ril shag tsa tri
NG0221:184: na ga thum ril shag / sa na ga dza
NG0221:185: yam gzir thum ril shag rbad /
NG0221:186: sa na ga ro tri yam shag gzir thum ril shag / 'jug pa nges par rab brtags la //
NG0221:188: rtags rnams 'khrugs sam kun nas zhugs //
NG0221:189: shi phrad drag sngags bcu gcig pa //
NG0221:190: rno dbal mtshon cha'i drag sngags bsdeb /
NG0221:192: bri du me srog la breng breng */
NG0221:193: rtsa la dun dun sbyar nan kham shag rbad /
NG0221:194: sa na' ga srog la breng breng dun dun thum ril na ga dzah /
NG0221:195: sa na ga srog la breng breng dza dza thum
NG0221:196: ril shag / sa na ga srog la hur dun
NG0221:197: dun thum ril shag / sa na ga tsit+ta thum
NG0221:198: ril shag / sa na ga rtsa la rbad thum
NG0221:199: ril shag / sa na' ga dum ling khas thum
NG0221:201: srog la thum ril shag / sa na ga kham
NG0221:202: nan thum ril shag / sa na ga snying gzer
NG0221:203: sbur nan thum ril shag / du me mam srog
NG0221:204: gzir thum ril shag / tsa tri shu la gzir
NG0221:205: nan thum ril shag / ro ni tri yang shig
NG0221:206: nan gzir thum ril shag / drag sngags med dbal
NG0221:207: 'khor lo mtshon // gdug pa'i rang gshed rang gis 'bebs //
NG0221:208: 'khor lo me dbal mtshon chen gyis //
NG0221:209: bdag srung gzhan skyob bstan pa'i yul //
NG0221:210: yang gsang thugs kyi sngags su bshad //
NG0221:211: 'jam dpal khro bo snying gzer gsang ba'i rgyud las /
NG0221:212: drag po'i sngags kyi le'u ste skabs gnyis pa'o //
NG0221:213: // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drag po sngags
NG0221:214: kyi rten / drag po rdzas kyi 'khrul 'khor 'di gsungs so //
NG0221:215: lho phyogs dur khrod ro sa dang *//
NG0221:216: phung sa gsum la dug chus sbru //
NG0221:217: grub khung gru gsum sbag tu brtsig / kha dog nag po rtsang gis bskor //
NG0221:218: dur khrod ras sam rgya shog la //
NG0221:219: dug khrag tsha ba'i rdzas phyugs la //
NG0221:220: mkhas pas 'khor lo bri bar bya //
NG0221:221: 'khor lo rim pa gsum du bskor //
NG0221:222: dbus su gru gsum zla gam gsum //
NG0221:223: 'khor lo bzhi gnyis bzhi gsum brtsig / phyi rim lcags mkhar drug par ldan //
NG0221:224: shi phrad kun 'joms bya ba yi //
NG0221:226: mu khyud bzhi pa rim gsum dbus //
NG0221:227: 'khrul mig bcu gnyis rtsa ba'i sngags //
NG0221:228: rtsa sbug dgu na snying po mchog / rtsibs chen bcu drug shi phrad sngags //
NG0221:230: mu khyud gsum la gru gsum dbus //
NG0221:231: phyi rim rgya gram rtsa ba'i lus //
NG0221:232: nyi shu gcig rtsibs phag mo'i ltor //
NG0221:233: bram ze'i klu gnyan 'joms par bshad //
NG0221:234: mu khyud gsum la rus sbal ltor //
NG0221:235: 'khrul mig bcu gnyis rtsa sbug bdun //
NG0221:237: mu khyud gsum la gru gsum dbus //
NG0221:238: mu khyud bcu gnyis bcu bzhi rtsibs //
NG0221:240: mu khyud bzhi pa 'bub gnas bzhi //
NG0221:241: rgya gram rtsa ba mtshams su gzugs //
NG0221:242: mu khyud zlum por gdug pa'i gzugs //
NG0221:243: phyi rol 'khrul mig bcu gcig pa //
NG0221:244: yang gsang bcu gcig 'khor lor gsungs //
NG0221:245: phyi ma gdug pa'i ro ras sam / rgya shog gro ga de dag la //
NG0221:246: gdug pa'i gzugs la sngags kyis bskor //
NG0221:247: 'khor lo kha sbyor thod par brub //
NG0221:248: ling+ga 'brub khung gan rkyal gzhag / nyung dkar dug khrag thun du brab //
NG0221:249: zhag grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu //
NG0221:250: drag po'i 'khor lo nyin mtshan bskor //
NG0221:251: bya rta mi yi tshil bu dang *//
NG0221:252: khyi phag spyang ki'i rtug pa dang *//
NG0221:253: mdzo rtol dre'u'i spu dang ni //
NG0221:254: ra dug re lcag thar nu btsod //
NG0221:255: nya sbrul sbal pa'i sha dag dang *//
NG0221:256: gu gul nag po'i dud pas bdug / mnol khrag myos pa'i khrag brlab cing *//
NG0221:257: brtul zhugs rdzas dang mtshon cha'i dbal //
NG0221:260: sri can thod par rab brubs la //
NG0221:261: bka' rten byin can 'og tu gnan //
NG0221:262: gzhan yang gdug pa'i nad zug na //
NG0221:263: bsku dang byug pa'i sbyor ba ni //
NG0221:264: spyang dug tsher ma gla chu dang *//
NG0221:265: spod dang tsha sna btsod khu dang *//
NG0221:266: ra dug long rtol gu gul dang *//
NG0221:267: ka ra bi ra dri chen dang *//
NG0221:268: ga bur tsan dan dkar chu dag / mu zi dri chen ldang ros dang *//
NG0221:269: ti tsa mar dkar ba bla dang *//
NG0221:270: gu gul ra dug ra gzhob bsku //
NG0221:271: ra tshwa rgya tshwa kha ru tshwa //
NG0221:272: ra dug ba spru dri chen dang *//
NG0221:273: ga bur gur gum ba bla bsku //
NG0221:274: sha ro ldang ros dbyi mo tshwa //
NG0221:275: dur byid sna tshogs thabs kyis sbyar //
NG0221:276: dug dang mu zi skar chu bsku //
NG0221:277: byug dang bsku ba'i rim pa'o //
NG0221:278: gla rtsi sgog skya sha chen dang *//
NG0221:279: dri chu dang ni zil pa la //
NG0221:280: brtag pa gsum byas sngags bzlas la //
NG0221:281: khong du btang bar yang dag bshad //
NG0221:282: 'jam dpal khro bo snying gzer gyi gsang rgyud las /
NG0221:283: rdzas dang 'khor lo'i le'u ste skabs gsum pa'o //
NG0221:284: // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag rgya
NG0221:285: chen po zil gnon 'di gsungs so //
NG0221:286: thog mar shes rab rtsal rig la //
NG0221:287: stong nyid snying rje'i rang bzhin las //
NG0221:288: skye 'gag med pa'i ye shes gsal //
NG0221:289: dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad //
NG0221:290: g.yas dkar g.yon dkar dbus mthing rngams //
NG0221:291: 'khor lo rdo rje ral gri dang *//
NG0221:292: be con gtun shing sdig mdzub 'bar //
NG0221:293: rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan dpal chas brgyad //
NG0221:294: phyi nang srog gshed sprul pa dang *//
NG0221:295: sgrol byed yum dang bcas gsal bas //
NG0221:296: sa bdag klu dang gnyan dag gi / snying ga la sogs sngags 'phros pas //
NG0221:297: gdug pa can gyi lto dkrugs te //
NG0221:298: srog dang rnam par shes pa kun //
NG0221:301: chu rgod skyin thang rlung nag 'khrugs //
NG0221:302: ri rab mtshon cha'i 'khor lo yis //
NG0221:303: rigs bzhi'i dug rnams 'joms par byed //
NG0221:304: gdug pa sgrol ba'i 'khor lor bshad //
NG0221:305: rnam smin tha mal lus nyid kyi //
NG0221:306: snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo la //
NG0221:307: dbus su ye shes chos kyi sku //
NG0221:308: phyag rgya zil gnon gsal ba yi //
NG0221:309: sngags kyi 'od zer mtshon cha'i dbal //
NG0221:310: 'phros pas dbugs kyi rtsa ded nas //
NG0221:311: dngas ma'i rtsa dang rtsa bran dang *//
NG0221:312: sha dang pags pa rus mig nas //
NG0221:313: nad dang dug rlangs kun ded nas //
NG0221:314: ba spu'i bu ga la sogs nas //
NG0221:315: sngo dmar du ba'i mdog lta bu //
NG0221:316: 'thon par bsams shing shes pa gdon //
NG0221:317: rnam smin gzhan gyi lus dag la //
NG0221:319: ba spu'i bu ga dgur thim nas //
NG0221:320: sngags kyi dbugs kyis nad zhi nas //
NG0221:321: zla gsal mun pa sel ba ltar //
NG0221:322: ye shes 'od kyi gong bur bsam //
NG0221:323: myos pa'i khrag dang mtshon cha dug / drag po rdzas kyi du ba yis //
NG0221:324: klu dang gnyan dang sa bdag dang *//
NG0221:325: ma mo rgyal po btsan the'u brang *//
NG0221:327: bdud mo dang dam sri dang *//
NG0221:328: sdong zlar gyur pa la sogs pa //
NG0221:329: rang rang gnas nas srog 'phrog ste //
NG0221:331: bsam gtan sems kyi 'khor lor bshad //
NG0221:332: 'jam dpal khro bo snying gzer gsang ba'i rgyud las /
NG0221:333: dbang sdud 'khor lor bstan pa'i le'u ste skabs bzhi
NG0221:334: pa'o // // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
NG0221:335: bsam gtan bum pa'i cho ga dang */
NG0221:336: phyag rgya chen po sbyin sreg gi cho ga 'di gsungs so //
NG0221:337: man+dal dri dang me tog mdzes //
NG0221:338: rin chen bum par rin chen bcud //
NG0221:339: 'bru dang sman tshogs dri dang ldan //
NG0221:340: gtsang ma gza' skar can gyi chu //
NG0221:341: kha rgyan mgul chings rab ldan bsham //
NG0221:342: sngags pas zil gnon skur bsgom lo //
NG0221:344: bum par phyag rgya'i lha tshogs bsam //
NG0221:345: drag sngags brgya bzlas bstim zhing bzhu //
NG0221:346: ye shes chu dang sngags kyi zer //
NG0221:347: spro zhing sprul pas zhen chags sbyong *//
NG0221:348: bsam gtan bsrung ba'i spyod pa bshad //
NG0221:349: snying la phyag rgya gsal ba yis //
NG0221:350: gsang sngags gsal bas rtsa rgyud dag / ye shes gong bur rab gsal ba //
NG0221:351: zla gsal 'khor lo'i srung bar bshad //
NG0221:352: rnam rtog bag chags sprin lta bu //
NG0221:353: nam mkha' lta bur 'dzin med na //
NG0221:354: bsam gtan sems kyi srung bar bshad //
NG0221:356: phyag rgya sems kyi bsam gtan gyi sngags 'di gsungs so //
NG0221:357: sarba tsit+ta ro myags kha tham srog gzir spur nan 'drid phyung hri shag rbad /
NG0221:358: kha chings rgyal po gsang ba'i mchog / bsam gtan 'phrul gyi srung bar bshad //
NG0221:359: phung sa gsum gyi thab khung ni //
NG0221:360: kha khyer gsum pa gru gsum brtsig / kha dog nag pos byug pa'i dbus //
NG0221:361: sna tshogs rdo rje ljang gu mdzes //
NG0221:362: gang gnod sa gnas rdzas rnams la //
NG0221:363: gdug pa gsum dang sdong zla bri //
NG0221:364: snying ga gdug cing rab tu gces //
NG0221:365: ming rus gro ga sen gang ba //
NG0221:366: dug gi ril bu brgya rtsa brgyad //
NG0221:367: mi rta khyi dang gdug pa'i sha / dug gsum tshil gsum gi hang bcas //
NG0221:368: til dang yungs nag tsha ba gsum //
NG0221:369: mar khu 'o ma sme ba'i khrag / nyung dkar rdo phye lcags zangs phye //
NG0221:370: bsreg rdzas rdzogs dang rnal 'byor bya //
NG0221:371: thab khung ram las me lhar bskyed //
NG0221:372: thugs kar phyag rgya'i lha gsal bar //
NG0221:373: rdzas dang ling+ga dbul bar bya //
NG0221:374: pho nya gtang zhing gdab pa dang *//
NG0221:375: drag sngags bzlas shing bsreg par bsam //
NG0221:376: sa na ga du ram na ga u nan gzer phyung srog la du ram /
NG0221:377: tsit+ta breng shag thum rbad e ram /
NG0221:378: sa na ga snying gzer du ram e nan 'drid phyung */
NG0221:379: sa na ga tsit+ta thum ril rbad /
NG0221:380: dz+wa la ram ma ra ya phat phat /
NG0221:381: ces pas gdug pa bsreg par bshad /
NG0221:382: thal ba gnon cing gzer bar bya //
NG0221:384: de nas yang ni bshad bya ba //
NG0221:385: nyon cig khro bo rol pa'i tshogs //
NG0221:386: sngags dang rdzas dang ting 'dzin dag / sbyor @#//
NG0221:387: ba rnam pa gsum gyi bsdeb //
NG0221:388: bsdeb dang rkyang pa nyams kyis brtag / bsdeb na rtsa ba'i snying po la //
NG0221:389: spu gri mtshon gyis snol mar bsdeb //
NG0221:390: bag chags zhen pa khrus kyis sbyang *//
NG0221:391: gdug rtsub sbyor ba me yis bsreg / las dang
NG0221:392: sbyor ba thun gyis bzlog / 'byung ba 'khrugs pa
NG0221:393: sman gyis bcos // zhes gsungs te 'khor la gdams so //
NG0221:394: 'jam dpal khro bo snying gzer gsang ba'i rgyud las /
NG0221:395: bkru ba dang sreg pa'i sbyor ba bstan pa'i le'u
NG0221:396: ste skabs lnga pa'o // // snying gzer gsang ba'i
NG0221:397: rgyud rdzogs so // phra rgyud drug cu rtsa gcig / rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud /
NG0221:398: 'jam dpal gshin rje 'bum sde rnam par bkod pa las /
NG0221:399: gdug pa klu 'dul byed le'u bkol pa'o //
NG0221:400: bal po'i rgyal po ba su+u d+ha ra dang */
NG0221:401: bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba spu ngan sangs rgyas ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o ///
